description.narrative: This initiative provides support for to improve governance and stability in Uruzgan and aligns with the February 2010 National Security Committee Operational Plan. Key activities include: (1) dialogue facilitation, peace building and stabilisation activies with local communities and institutions; (2) research and analysis to increase operational knowledge on leadership, power relations, traditional structures and local conflict contect in Uruzgan; and (3) building provincial and community based monitoring and evaluation capacity. The total value of this initiative is $5.0 million over 3 years, starting 2010-11.
